resources.string: You are underweight So you may need to put on some weight.

⦿This app was created to track daily water intake.
⦿After drinking, press the button with a number on it multiple times or select custom amount and press it for example (250 adds 250ml, 500 adds 500ml).
⦿Progress resets everyday.
⦿This app has a reminder, that reminds you to drink every hour.
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

string-array.name: tips_array
string-array.item: You are severely underweight. It is a sign that you are not eating enough or you may be ill.
You are underweight So you may need to put on some weight.Take some Healthy Fruits and Vegies to live a healthy life style.
That\'s Great !!!You are at a healthy weight for your height. You lower your risk of developing serious health problems.
You are slightly overweight. You may be advised to lose some weight for health reasons.Take healthy diet an Do some workouts.Daily Morning walk will keep you fit and Healthy.
You are heavily overweight.Your health may be at risk if you do not lose weight.But Don\'t Worry Follow our Portion Control and Do some Workouts to live a Healthy Lifestyle
